Stretching out high above him, was the insole of his mom's high-heeled pump. He must've fallen in when she got up and knocked him unconscious. Scott shivered as he realized how long he was out. It was night, meaning the weekend was over. Which meant there was a good chance this shoe was going to be occupied by his mom's foot in the morning. And any poor soul in its way.

The miniaturized teen desperately clambered to each side of the shoe as the night carried on. But the sides of the pump stretched completely out of his reach. Even Kelly would never find him down here, as far as she was aware he was still lint between his mom's buttcheeks right now. Closing his eyes tight, Scott began to cry.

Why is this happening to me...?

He had to at least survive. Kelly's fib wouldn't hold out much longer. Mom would definitely be concerned if I'm still gone by tomorrow, Scott thought.I just need to make it until then. I need mom to see me!
111111222111112211122.title: High Heel Hell

choices: Cathy's job has her sitting all day
Cathy's job has her on her feet all day
1111112221111122111221.content:
Scott didn't realize he fell asleep until he was woken up by his mother's morning routine. Her footsteps, muffled by carpet and distance, were still more than powerful enough to shake the tiny boy's entire world.

This is it, my last chance, he thought. Scott felt like shit; his empty stomach ached, his cracked lips stung, and his whole body felt like a giant welt. But he could still move, and Scott pulled himself up the heel's incline. He knew this was a risk; staying by the front of the shoe offered a better chance at not getting crushed, but there was no way he could spend an entire work day under Cathy's toes. If she didn't spot him before the shoe went on, he rather be crushed and just be done with this.

And so Scott waited, laying next to a faded letter twice his size, hoping and dreading what was next. Cathy's routine whirred along in the background, her shrunken son listening to the rush of the shower, to her soft humming as she did her hair, to the rustle of clothes as she dressed. One thing left, they both thought.

Scott flinched as she came into the view. He was expecting it, but watching her enormous figure as she settled on the bed above him was still incredible. The boy struggled up to his feet, leaning against the pump's wall. "Help!" He shouted, waving his arms up above. His heart sank, however, as her torso and head moved away, blocked by towering legs clad in smart, dark grey slacks. Still, he shouted with all he was worth, knowing his tiny voice was inaudible but unwilling to give in.

Cathy's right foot lifted high in the air, giving her son a terrifying glimpse of her no-show sock's graying sole before in plunged down out of view. Cathy leaned over, her hand reaching down to guide the foot into the unoccupied shoe. "Please, for the love of god just look!" Tears streamed down Scott's face as Cathy still didn't hear him.

Her eyes peered down towards him. For a moment, Scott thought it was all over; she'd seen him, and he'd be saved! But her face didn't change, recognition failed to show in her eyes, and with a wimper Scott sank to his knees.

He'd failed, and now he was going to die.

Cathy's foot was in the air, a fraying cotton sky that blocked out her face. Scott gasped as the foot plunged down, long toes slamming into the insole right before him.

"No!" he screamed, tumbling down as the whole shoe rocked. The foot lunged forward, Scott just out of its reach as each lurching tug of the shoe bumped him further down the slope. "Wait, just let me die then!" But it was just another prayer to be ignored, as the socked toes finally caught up, pulling him into their grasp as Cathy stood. "Aggh! AHHHH" He screamed, wailing into the thin strands around him as his whole body was pressed into the pad of her second toe.


"Alright girls, I'm off to work," Cathy said, standing at the kitchen's doorway as Shannon and Kelly finished up their breakfasts. "Kelly, before you go to school can you drop Sarah off at Karen's house? She said she'd watch her today."

"Mhhh, not a problem."

"Oh, and if either of you see Scott, let me know. I haven't heard from him all weekend and I'm getting a little worried." She turned and headed towards the front door, ignoring the small irregularity under her left foot. "Have a nice day, and I'll see you after work!"


Crack!

Oh god it's broken, she's breaking me, why why WHY!

Scott was beginning to lose it. He tumbled along, essentially a pebble for Cathy to toy with. He wailed uselessly into the darkness, as each step dislodged him from her toes' grip, just for him to be pressed flat beneath her as she finished the step. His arm was limp, unresponsive; not that it mattered much in here, where his every motion was decided by the whim of the toes, which grabbed him and flipped him and squeezed him and crushed him. He felt the fabric around him begin to dampen with sweat, and he knew in a short time his prison would become a swamp.

But there was nothing he could do. He was helpless. All she was doing was walking, and yet it overwhelmed him. He felt the toes suddenly curl around him tighter, pulling him deeper into their embrace. "Please, please, NO!" he screamed, before the damp cotton flooded into his mouth, and the world crushed around him.


"Oooh dearest brother~!" Kelly couldn't hold back the smile as she strolled into her mother's room. "How was your night?"

She opened the laundry bin and pulled out the pair of underwear she'd sown her brother into to. She gave it a sniff. "Phew, that's rank! I hope it wasn't too much for you, what with your reduced..."

"Scott?"
1111112221111122111221.title: Worn again

choices: Kelly comes clean, but has no idea where Scott is currently
Kelly makes up a new fib
11111122211111221112211.content:
Of all the trials Scott had endured thus far since his shrinking, this one was by far the worst. Though his trips up his mother's snatch and anus were far more humiliating and mentally scarring (potentially for the both of them, should she ever find out) his new prison within her shoe brought with it untold levels of pain. He bore the woman's entire weight when she took a step, her thin sock and foot flesh jamming itself tightly down his throat as his minuscule body sunk into the pump's moist insole. When her foot lifted he was given just enough time to desperately suck in oxygen, saturated as it was with the flavors of tangy leather and footsweat. And so the cycle repeated over and over, Cathy's footsteps hammering the life out of him while he was forced to listen to her greet her coworkers like any other day.

In fact the sounds of the outside world casually continuing without him, muffled by the layers of shoe and foot were probably what hurt the most. He was cut off from the rest of the world, no longer human but lint beneath his mother's foot. Not even Kelly, the one person who could save his life should she change her mind, help him now as even she was under the impression he'd still be sewn in Cathy's undergarments. He was truly lost to the world.

Cathy sat at her work desk, typing away. Below, she slowly popped the heels from her shoes, reliving herself from their tightness. Gracious cool air began to filter down to Scott and he desperately gulped what he could. He yelped as her foot dragged back even more up the shoe's sole, taking him with it. He was glued to her sock like the other lint fuzzies surrounding him.

Then all hell broke loose as Cathy pulled both feet from her heels entirely and began violently swinging them about beneath her desk, knocking the pumps over and sliding her feet around among the carpet and base of her chair. Scott, tangled up in the strands of her no-show socks and bonded to the cotton through sheer contact was dragged along for the ride. Every so often her toes would press into a surface and mash his twisted arm and he would see white flashes from the pain and scream bloody murder. Still, she remained ignorant to his cries as she hummed above.

The foot trapping Scott among it suddenly lurched high into the air as Cathy crossed her legs. Scott moaned with dizzying pain as her foot swayed back and forth and rotated at the ankle. He was ready to pass out when he heard the sounds of a buzzing cell phone.

"Hello?" "Yes this is she."

The rocking of his mother's foot suddenly stopped.

"He what?!" "Are you sure?"

"I h-haven't seen him in a few days but last I heard was with friends..."

Scott was barely conscious, but he realized what was going on. School would be wondering where he was about this time. It was hard to imagine an end to this hell though as Cathy's foot began shaking from nervousness, swinging him about violently once more.

"Okay." "Okay I will."

Scott screamed as Cathy's foot suddenly swung back down and retook ownership of its pump. He was yet again plunged into the rank darkness, his arm howling with pain as she wrenched her foot back and forth to fit into the shoe.

Up above Cathy was calling Kelly. She was in school, but still would hopefully answer her cell. She was acting weird earlier, and now the worried mother was suspecting she might be covering for Scott or something. She clenched her toes from nervousness, praying that her son was okay, never dreaming that she was currently squashing him beneath her foot like putty.

"Mom..?"

"Kelly, Scott never showed up at school. Have you heard anything?"

"U-uhm..."

"Honey, you're not hiding anything are you?"
11111122211111221112211.title: Trampled

choices: Kelly spots Scott, and frees him from the laundry
Kelly misses Scott, and leaves him in the basket
111111222111112211122112.content:
"Honey, you're not hiding anything are you?"

She was so, so screwed. How could she have lost her brother? And how was she supposed to tell Mom? It's not like she could just tell her. Even if she bought the idea of a person just randomly shrinking, telling her about the dildo and the underwear would get her grounded for the rest of her life. Lying got me into this, lying will get me out.

"Sorry Mom," she said, holding the quiver in her voice back as well as she could. "That's all I know. I'm just worried for him." Shit, that's bad. Gotta draw attention away from myself. "You don't think he ran away, do you?"

Cathy sighed, rubbing her eyes. "I don't know what to think. I mean, he hasn't shown any reason to want to leave, you know, beyond usual teenage standoffish." She paused, rubbing her eyes. "I just hope he's okay."

"I'm not okay! I'm not oka--" Scott shouted, before a shift of her foot pushed his head beneath the pad of her big toe.

"Alright honey, I'll talk to you after school," Cathy said, missing her son's frantic wails.

"Love you, Mom."

"Love you too." Click.

Cathy rubbed her eyes again. Nothing I can do right now. I'll talk to the police when I get off.

"I'm right here!" Scott screamed as Cathy's toes rubbed together, dragging him between them. He repeated himself, shouting and crying, insisting to the void, and more importantly to himself, that he was still here, still a person, still alive. But the world ignored him, and Cathy ignored him. His words turned to yelps as Cathy's nervous footplay, worsened by news of her missing son, became wilder. Her foot, hovering in the air as she crossed her legs, went wild, bucking and rotating around her ankle. Her heel popped free from the pump again, dangling off her toes, which in turn wriggled and twitched, constantly moving to keep the shoe balanced. Scott felt himself pull tighter into the fabric of the sock as she stretched, his sore arm yanked to its limit under the soft arch of her toes. They battered him, treating him like he was simply a speck of lint suspended between ball and toes, holding him tight to her every time they squeezed together.

He retched, but all that came up was warm, salty sweat. The shoe dropped free, slamming into the ground far below. She ignored it. Her legs uncrossed and slammed onto the ground before sliding back and forth. The carpet felt good on her tired soles but it reached up and tore at Scott. Tiny flecks of dust and dirt, caught in the carpet much like how he was caught to the sock, scratched at his skin as he was rocketed across the floor. He felt gashes open and immediately fill with stinking, stinging sweat. His whole body convulsed in the micrometer of space he had between the endless floor and his mother's crushing weight, every single feeling replaced with burning agony.


And so the day went. Cathy continued to torture her son as she fretted over his location. During lunch, she slipped the shoe back on, nearly decapitating the boy when her toes got caught on the pump's opening, but it came off once more as she finished the work day. By the time she clocked out and drove home, his screams had long since fallen to quiet whimpers, and even those were beginning to die off. She picked Sarah up from Karen's house (Scott nearly suffocated as his mom stood still in her friend's driveway, chatting for nearly ten minutes while he struggled to get even a whiff of air), then headed home.

"Kelly, Shannon?" She called as she walked in, Sarah having toddled off into the living room.

Shannon looked up from the kitchen table, where she was diligently working on a coloring book. "Hi Mommy."

"Hey, sweetie. I'm going to get changed, then I'm going to... run some errands." No need to worry her about her brother just yet. "Dinner's just leftovers tonight. Get Kelly to help you warm something up, okay?"

Shannon nodded, and Cathy headed to her room. She sat on her bed, slipping her shoes off before rubbing her tired soles. She hated wearing pumps, but dress code was dress code, and while she'd like to sit down and just rest, she couldn't stop thinking of Scott, and of all the horrible things that could have happened. Images of her boy lying face down in some ditch ran through her mind.

She slipped off her clothes, dropping her socks into the hamper and hanging her slacks and blazer up for tomorrow. As she was pulling her underwear down, Kelly barged in.

"Hey Mom, what'd you- oops, sorry!" Kelly said, backing out of the room, but not before she saw what panties Cathy was discarding.

"I'm going to the police station, gonna file a missing person's report. It's been long enough. Dinner's on you, okay? Just heat something up for Shannon and Sarah, I'll make real food tomorrow." She walked out of the room, dressed in more casual clothes and much more comfortable sneakers. She hugged her daughter, kissing her on the head. "Be back soon."

"Love you Mom," Kelly said, watching her mother go. And, as soon as the car pulled out of the driveway, she leaped into action, rushing back to her mother's room.

Please, please, please be in there, Scott! Kelly had racked her brain all day, and her only hope left was that Scott ended up getting stuck in Cathy's crack, and spent the whole day in the pair of underwear she wore to work today. Kelly practically dove into the laundry basket, rooting around for that pair of panties she saw just minutes ago. As she feared, they were devoid of any tiny brothers, but it didn't mean she was wrong. Maybe he slipped free from them and was lost in the pile of old, smelly clothes at this very instant.

Meanwhile, Scott was laying prone in the middle of a ball of hot, sopping fabric, a small living core to the mashed up ball of sock that Cathy had chucked into the hamper. He was free, more or less, arms and legs removed from the fabric's grip when the sock was pulled from the foot, but his sore body, caked in drying and dried sweat, just wanted to rest. And so when his world was torn open just minutes later, he couldn't be bothered to even move as Kelly's hands shuffled his prison about.

Light flooded his eyes as the sock tumbled down the clothes pile and unfolded, revealing to him Kelly's face. She did this to him; she put him in this whole predicament in the first place, and now as her eyes scoured the pile, she was his only hope.
111111222111112211122112.title: An all day affair

choices: Cathy has taken the day off, and is doing laundry
Scott awakens to an empty house
Something Else
1111112221111122111221122.content:
Kelly moved a few more pieces of clothing around in the pile before slapping down with a huff of frustration. Scott watched trembling as she stomped away. He was both relieved and terrified. Terrified in that she would've been able to pluck him from the hamper, but relieved that he wouldn't be in her clutches again. He shuddered remembering some of the other ideas Lynden had in store for him...

Meanwhile Kelly paced around in the hall, unsure of what to do. She had no idea where Scott could be now. If he had indeed gotten himself stuck between her mom's buttcheeks earlier he could've ended up drowning in her workplace's pipes below. Or perhaps he fell from her pants somewhere and was lost forever. She hadn't thought of any of this through, acting purely on instinct but now she was worried of what would happen if the police questioned her or something. Still, no one would believe her brother shrank....

Scott was attempting to move his throbbing body up the mountain of musky worn clothes but there was just so much. He had to get his mom's attention somehow and end this nightmare, but he was just too exhausted from the day's experience. Tomorrow would be a new day. He desperately needed food and water, but for now Scott went limp and let sleep consume him...

The next morning...
1111112221111122111221122.title: Time To Rest

choices: Try to get Shannon's attention now.
Find a place on the table to wait and hide.
Too late - Shannon needs the red again!
11111122211111221112211222.content:
Scott's gunked over eyes slowly cracked open. Sluggishly, he sat up; everything ached, his skin was a mottled tapestry of bruises, and it felt like one of his ribs was cracked. Without any exaggeration, yesterday had been the worst day of his life. And yet, today was a new day. Today, he was free from Kelly's prisons, hurt but not broken, and today he'd find rescue.

First, though, he had to survive. And to to that, he needed real food and fresh water.

An hour later, Scott had limped his way out of the laundry basket and across his mother's carpet towards the hallway. He groaned, feeling like a zombie that had already began to fall apart. At the top of the staircase, he collapsed, sinking into the musty carpet. His body just didn't have any more to give. In this condition, how was he going to get down even a single step?

Hissss

An unfamiliar sound came from behind. Groggily, Scott turned his head. There, staring him in the eyes, was a spider, fangs dripping with venom.

"Fuck!" Nearly forgetting the pain, he leaped to his feet, backing away from the creature. It was a small one, hardly the size of a terrier to the shrunken boy. Still, it seemed more confidant than he did; as Scott backed further and further away, it marched closer, gaining distance with every step.

Scott glanced around for something, anything. His clothes were long gone, and the floor seemed freshly vacuumed; no discarded toothpicks to use as spears, no weapons to improvise from trash. It was just him and the bug, and at this rate the bug was going to-

Suddenly, the floor beneath Scott was gone. In his haste to escape, he failed to notice as he scampered beneath the banister and towards the edge of the landing, and with that last step he found himself on a one way ticket to the first floor. Helpless, flailing, screaming, Scott had just enough time to recognize the kitchen table below him before he slammed into it with a splat.


The vague sounds of movement rumbled through the boy's unconscious mind, prompting him to stir. His eyes opened once more.

SLAM! Scott gasped, as a dull red crayon the size of a semi truck crashed down beside him. Shannon's grimy fingers lifted off it, carelessly allowing it to roll - right towards the boy! Adrenaline pumping, Scott scrambled to his feet but it was already too late, and the crayon rolled right into him, then over him, then over him again. He wailed, his tiny body glued to the waxy paper by the revolting mix of fluid on him. Twice more he was flattened, before his prison slammed into another crayon and knocked him free. He stumbled to his knees, catching his breath in the shadow of the crayon.

Above, mouth parted in concentration, was Shannon, hard at work at her coloring book. Kitchen table, right, Scott recalled, remembering how his younger sis always colors here after school. Could she help? She was a bit young, but she had to be more trustworthy than Kelly.

And if the thought alone summoned her, Kelly appeared, walking into the kitchen with an empty glass. On instinct, Scott cowered, hiding in the shadow of "Brick Red." She looked concerned, almost worried; Of course, she's lost me, he thought. Good, let her steam. She's a goddamned monster.

She turned towards the table. Scott's heart leapt; even though he knew he was hidden, her gaze was still terrifying. "Shan, Mom said she'd be bringing food home. You need a snack?"

The little girl shook her head. "Nope! Just gonna color~!"

With that, Kelly wandered off. Probably to look for me, Scott thought, frowning. This was his chance. Was he going to run towards his seven year old sister and try for her help, or was he going to find a secure spot on the table and wait for his mom?
11111122211111221112211222.title: Back to the kitchen

choices: begins digging in!
sees a bug in her food
sees... Scott?
111111222111112211122112222.content:
Scott clambered beneath the cover of a gigantic bowl of fruit away from the gaze of his giant-sized little sister. He knew he was better off waiting for his mom to get home then trying to get help from Shannon. He shuddered, imagining what she'd do to him if she mistook his tiny form for a bug. He'd already gone through enough mentally scarring events for one lifetime.

He continued to hide for what seemed like forever with nothing but Shannon's vapid singing for company; Kelly occasionally wandering in and nervously looking around for him to no avail. Eventually the thunderous sounds of the colossal front door broke the monotony and Cathy appeared, Sarah and dinner in tow. Scott curled into a ball beneath the bowl of fruit and tensed up. Dinner would be served soon and he would grab his mom's attention then and end this entire nightmare.

He could hear his mom's thunderous voice explaining to Kelly and Shannon that he was still nowhere to be found. He felt bad for putting his family through so much stress, then white hot anger at listening to Kelly bullshit her way through the conversation pretending that she didn't know he was in very real danger. When he got big he was going to destroy her.

Scott's train of thought was interrupted as a bag of chinese food slammed down on the table inches from him with such force it nearly threw him into the air. His mom towered even higher than it, larger than the largest skyscraper. He screamed up at her for help as she dug through the bag and placed the various dishes onto the table, but her attention was currently held up by her teenage daughter who was heading upstairs.

"You're not going to eat?" Cathy asked.

"I will later, I'm just uh, I'm looking for something..!" Kelly stammered out as she retreated upstairs. She darted into her mom's room and began digging through her dirty clothes one more time, praying that she somehow missed her brother among the discarded clothes.

Cathy muttered to herself about how strange Kelly had been acting and then sat down to eat. It's not like I can blame her, she thought to herself. She was probably worried sick about Scott as well. She was entirely unaware that her son was currently miniaturized and trying to hoist himself onto her pinky finger as her hand rested on the table.

Scott made a desperate move but he was unsure if his mom was going to stay at the table. It was now or never. As the aroma of the food swirled around him he dashed to his mom's titanic hand and tried to clamber up onto her smallest finger. Unfortunately he miscalculated, and Cathy lifted her hand up to grab a soy sauce packet.

Her hand rocketed up at warp speed and Scott was immediately torn from it. Screaming, he plummeted right into something warm and gooey. He sputtered as he sank beneath the red material. Gagging, he managed to break the surface by grabbing onto a giant seed that was larger than his entire body. It was then when he realized where he had fallen-- into a giant tray of his mother's sesame chicken. The pieces of meat towered over him like hills and she crested the horizon above like a planetary body in the sky.

His blood chilling, Scott tried to climb out of the deadly sauce, but its gooey thickness acted as quicksand and held him in place. Instead he switched to thrashing and screaming, terrified that this was how his tale was going to end.

Cathy looks down at her dinner and...
111111222111112211122112222.title: Dinner is Served

choices: Shannon, the seven-year-old
Sarah, the three-year-old
11111122211111221113.content:
I was so close! It's not fair! Scott thought, pounding at the glass walls of the jar Kelly had placed him within. She stared back at him, a huge grin parting her face.

"Thought you were done, huh little brother?" She flicked the glass with a fingernail, the force knocking Scott back on his rear. "Why, you can't seriously be telling me you're not having fun?"

"I'm not, you fucking bitch!" he shouted, fully aware his voice couldn't reach her.

He had crawled up the bed, through perilous footing and Cathy's way-too-frequent shifting, only for Kelly to pop in when he was near armpit height. And wouldn't you know it, she was to one person in this damned household to notice him. She pocketed him and slid away, dropping him in this jar so she could get in contact with her partner in crime.

"Hmm, I guess Lynden's not online right now." Kelly grabbed Scott's jar, her skin pale as it pressed against the glass. "Oh well. I guess I get to pick your next fun adventure~!"

She stood pacing the room while she swung the jar around, slamming Scott against the walls as she strolled. "I guess you've had your fill of Mom, based on your little escape attempt. I guess I could drop you off with one of your lovely sisters. Is that more your speed?" She held his jar up to her face, as if she'd listen to a word he'd say. Scott shuttered, recalling times when Shannon drowned a bug in her spit simply because it walked past her, or when Sarah broke toys in fits of toddler rage.

As if she could see Scott's pale grimace, Kelly smiled. "Yeah, that'll be fun."

"But which one, huh little bro?"
11111122211111221113.title: Kelly decides on another family member

choices: Shannon gets bored and decides to spit on the bugs
An ant grabs Scott in its mandibles
Scott manages to escape deeper into the yard
111111222111112211131.content:
Kelly opened the sliding door to the backyard, grimacing at the heat. Sure enough Shannon was outside though, digging up dirt and messing about with bugs. Kelly flashed the jar in her hand an evil grin as she approached their younger sibling.

"Hey Shannon!" Kelly said in an innocent singsong voice, "Look what I found! A new kind of bug!"

Instantly Shannon stood up, her interest piqued. Scott ran to the end of the glass and began pounding desperately, praying and screaming for recognition, but there was no sense of humanity in Shannon's huge brown eyes as they fell upon him.

"I've never seen one like that... let me go get my magnifying glass!" Shannon got ready to head into the house but Kelly stopped her.

"No!" She said, perhaps too eagerly, but she couldn't risk Shannon knowing what the "bug" really was, "I already looked at it. It's honestly nothing special to look at, but I know how you love playing with insects." She glanced about, seeing the small hole in the yard Shannon had dug up. "He'll be right at home here, huh?"

Kelly overturned the jar, sending Scott's shrieking form into the soft pit below. He tumbled down what felt like an eternity and instantly nearly felt his heart rip out of his chest when he got a look at his surroundings.

Ants, enormous ones, crawling all about around him.

"FUUUUCK!!! KELLY NO! SHANNON!!! HELP!!!" Scott began to sob and panic, at his size the ants were like cars and they were moving about fast. He could see Shannon towering above squatting with her hands on her knees as she studied his movements intently. Kelly had already seemingly walked off.

"Hey there mister bugsy!" Shannon's words boomed as Scott tried to make his way about the moshpit of ants, screaming for his sister's help. She brushed her hair out of her face as she continued to look down upon his plight. "Looks like you're not much of a fighter."

Ants continued to scamper by Scott at speeds he couldn't comprehend. Shivering, he made a break for the nearest dirt wall trying his best to dodge the surrounding beasts that thankfully didn't seem too interested in him. Still, every time he felt an antennae brush by or a lone ant leg trip him up he wanted to die. If he ever got to full size he was going to kill Kelly six times over.

Just as he reached one edge of the pit and began to climb the soft soil...
111111222111112211131.title: Shannon's Judgement

choices: Shannon pees on Scott.
Shannon is interrupted.
1111112221111122111311.content:
Wailing to himself, Scott slammed into the shear dirt wall, pressing himself flat against the surface. The ants swarmed around him, moving in every which way. Seems like Shannon interrupted whatever sort of order the colony had.

Scott peered up at her. Her eyes, bright and curious, were scanning the hole. "Little buggy, where'd you go?" Had she really already lost him?

"Shannon! I'm not a bug, I'm your brother! Help me, plea- Ahh!" Scott screamed, falling to his butt as an ant's leg, tall as he was, swiped across his midsection. "No, no, oh my God no!" Tears rolled down his face as he realized he was looking up at the ants.

Cowering under the footsteps of ants, Scott almost missed the sudden darkening of the sky.

"What..." He peered up through watery eyes, in awe and horror as his little- no, younger- sister rose to her full height. Her left foot shifted forward, toes clutching the far side of the pit, an easy 10 yards above his head. Her face was cast in the sun's shadow, a dark goddess who's voice rang out over her subjects.

"I'm bored now." Scott's heart sank, and even the ants seemed to get that trouble was brewing as their random scurrying seemed to quicken. The boy struggled to his feet, only for a passing ant's antenna to slap across his face and send him back to his knees.

Scott, his face beginning to swell, squinted up at his sister turned deity. Her shadowed lips were pursed, a harsh gurguling sound eminating from her throat. "What is she-"

~BOOM~

Suddenly the ground maybe five yards away errupted in an explosion. Drops of moisture rained down onto the boy, and then ants, or at least those not caught in the epicenter, began to scatter towards the edges of the pit. She's spitting on them!?

With a new-found haste, the ants rushed away from the girl towards the far wall-- and right towards Scott. He didn't even have time to scream before they were on him, a black and red wave of chitin and limbs and pincers. They clambered over him, pushing him to the ground, trampling over him. Their legs pounding into his chest, knocking the breath from him as their weight began to force him into the soft soil. He screamed, bloody curses pouring from his lips as insects used him as a doormat. He needed out of here, he'd do anything to get out of here. Years on the dildo would be better than this!

Shannon wasn't done. Another spot bomb slams down a yard away, close enough to drench Scott. An ant, hit hard by the loogie, stumbles over to the crying boy, and with a final chitter collapses on him, its soaking carapace crashing onto his legs. You free fall screaming. “AHAHAHAHAHAHAH!”, there is no way to stop your decent. Your life flashes through your eyes, fights with your sisters, going to the movies with Kim, Mom’s hugs…the divorce. You know you are going to die and close your eyes as the wind whips around you…
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Brenda was greeting her guests as they arrived. Mrs. Avian guided her husband towards Mrs. Coodly. Sally Avian was the president of the committee and a scandalous flirt and rumor monger. She was supposedly in her 50s but with all of her husband’s money she spent on surgery, face, lips, and other endowments, made her look at most 10 years younger. She also clearly died her hair a deep yellow blond though the roots showed dark and gray. She also was wearing several large sets of jewels including a draping set of precious stones with small fingerings between intervals. Kind of an Aztec or mid America design, she also was showing of draping earrings that looked like they weighed lbs. each along with large rings and bracelets. There was a thing such as too much but that was lost on Sally Avian. “Brenda, Dear, how have you been?”

“Oh, wonderful,” Brenda Coodly placed spill on her face. “So lovely to see…” she stopped in mid sentence feeling something hit the top of her head. She reached for her hair at the same time looking up to see if there was a rain cloud or something. All she saw was a bird fly away. For a moment she feared the bird might have let its droppings fall on her.

“Brenda?” Sally asked faking a worried look.

Brenda looked back down and ran her hand through her hair then back so she could see it. Nothing, thank good ness. She smiled bat Sally, “Nothing, just thought I felt a rain drop but look, not a cloud in the sky.” Sally smiled…

+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

You hit on something but it wasn’t the ground and you didn’t go splat like you expected. You are sprawled out on…something. You grab at long red rope like strands taking bunches into you hands. Just in time too because the floor shift and you are clinging to hang on. A moment later something lands in front of you. Then as the surface once again levels out you see whatever it is sweeping towards you. Grabbing on with one hand you let go and move over just as the giant thing is about to pass bye spilling a wave of the red strands over you burying you.

You hang on where you are as the surface shifts, turning and you hear indistinguishable booming voices. You are afraid to move too much but you have no choice but to try and crawl out and find out where you are. But you do it slowly and consciously. You poke your head out form your cover. And to your surprise you are looking down at a giant woman with huge blond hair and giant red lips even for a giant. Another sudden movement happens and you or to be more precise the surface spins around to face two new giants a man wearing a dark gray suit and a woman that looks like she was dressed for tie with the queen of England. What the hell?

There are more sounds… But you take no interest trying to look for a way off this, you guess it is a person and try to see the fence back to your yard and hopefully home. You manage to see it but then are turned around and whoever this is starts going into the wrong direction. You crawl a bit forward tying to stay hidden but also not alert this person that you are up here. The last thing you want is to be found like this by some stranger.
+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++

Brenda heads over to the bar to get a drink. She hates these odious people but at the same time she couldn’t imagine life without her social status and her other responsibilities. She looks down to grabs a glass of wine and sips it. Daniel comes up to her. “Uh, Mom, I’m heading out, see yah.”

“Have fun dear.” Brenda gives her daughter a hug then watches her walk off. More guests arrive and before long it is time to sit at the tables wile opening presentations start. As the hostess Brenda has to honor of also being seated with the President as well as the other officers of the committee and Social Club. Sitting at the table she smils and listens to Sally talking about her new necklass as it rests around her all too revieled bust line. Brenda looks down to inspect the neclice politly as expected to fane interest.

You figured out you were on someone's head just as it dipped forward. There had been no time to grab onto the rople like strangs of hair. You tried reaching out as you flipped over and tumbled over. Then you were free falling...

It lasted less then a second, your eyes tightly shut out of instinct SPLASH. You hit water, sharp bighting needle like spikes hit all over your skinn then your sank, submerging over your head. You kicked your legs, reaching for the surface, for air. Breaking free your eyes opened and instantly were stinging, and your mouth opened wide taking in air and a rich, bitter taste. You fell back and went under again but this time not as far.

Finally you came up again and this time stayed up treding 'water'. You open your eyes. Blinking away the sting you see clear glass walls around you. Turning around, kicking your feet you look around and see that your are surrouned and up it curves in like a bowl. Focusing you see beyond hte clear glass more giants. Mrs. Cooley, your neighbor was infront of you. She looked distorted through the glass but you could see it was her and how big she was...again you realized how small you really were. Turning again you see who is with her. A shorter woman in a long white dress with large blond hair...the woman that you noticed earlier, the one with the big big lips.

It was only taking moments but you were panting...treding the liquid to keep up was getting harder...You still had the taste in your mouth...WINE! Realizing that you turned and tried to see beyond the glass all around you. There was a white plane and many many glass trees with red liquid in them. Red wine...

You have no time to think of getting out shen the contents of your glass bowl shift and you are doused with red wine...

The red liquid washes over you and you go under...Breaking back to the surface you kick staying up and wipe your face. Then you open them feeling the current. You stare shocked and stare as you are being brought to the biggest set of lips you have ever seen. And the glass it tipping!


Sally picked up a glass from the table. "Oh I do so enjoy these parties. The compeny is delightful and the beverages are always top of the line." She gives Mrs. Cooley a gentile salute with her new glass and takes a sip.


Instantly you start kicking and paddling trying to pull away and fight the current but it is no use. Everything slows down and you turn seeing yourself getting closer and closer. You kick out actually hitting the soft red flesh. then to your relief everthing moves away and you and the rest of the wine slosh back into the glass.

You are stunned but alive. Drinched and gasping for breath, chocking on the strong wine you panic. You nearly were swollowed hole, and there was nothing you could have done...how, how could this have been hapening? What...what were you going to do?


Sally moved around the party. She smiled and chit chatted. Many complemented her shade of lipstick...which agmented her already agmented lips. They of course were so numb that she couldn't feel a thing but she had practiced smiling enough to know she was. She took another sip of her wine.


You tried to get out but the brim was to high. And the constant sloshing wasn't helping. Then to your terror the glass was tipping again. You trited to cling to the sides and swim away but it wasn't working and you went back to the maw of those parted lips.

You fought as hard as you could but slowly you were going in. It was at the last moment the lips came closed and their soft firm wals sealed - over your foot. The glass moved away but you dragged back saging. In that instant you fell and hit a pale fleshy wall (Sally's chin) and the next you were plumeting.


Sally just wipped her chin when the woman she was talking to, a Anne Hastings, blinked and commented "Sally, what was that?"

"What was what, Dear?" Sally asked.

"For the briefest moment I swear I saw something dangling from your mouth...just now but it fell away." Anne began looking down to the ground. So did Sally.

"Well I don't see anything," Sally said she steped forward and to the side but saw nothing but the grass. Looking back to Anne, "Realy, Dear, perhaps you've had too much to drink. Maybe you need to sit down a bit."

"Maybe..." Anne agreed

You grab your throbbing hand. Oh the pain, you can’t move it and you can see it is red and swelling. You hear the THUMP, THUMP of Kelly’s walking and without looking you just run for any shelter you can. In the corner of your eye you see a large black cave like thing, out of panic you run and dive into it as your sister’s giant feet stamp past. You hide in the darkness and gasp for air from your panicked run. You cradle your hand and try to move it. I burns with pain and feels raw and large with the swelling of blood. Your fingers move and you figure it isn’t broken but should still be put on ice which is the least of your problems right now.

You get your breath and look around you. You are in what you guess is a shoe because it is soft and a little musky in here. But the thing is you dived into it with out climbing in. You can tell it isn’t turned over and you look out into the light of the room. There is no back to this shoe; your sister doesn’t have any shoes that you’ve noticed without backs. Move thumping comes and you see two giant feet in white ankle socks stand outside your hiding place. You are by no means an expert on feet but you know those aren’t Kelly’s feet, you got up close and personal with those and these are way bigger.

“HONEY, WHERE ARE MY BROWN MULES?” Your mom! “OH HERE THEY ARE NEVER MIND.” You stare in horror as the giant white clad foot turns and plunges into your hiding place. “Mom stop…” You try to get away but it isn’t any use you are hit by the wall of white cotton and shoved to the toe section of the mule.

Cathy slipped on her shoes casually and walks out of Kelly’s room. “Honey, have you seen your brother?” “NO!” Kelly calls from the living room. “Okay, I’m taking Shannon to the pool and meet up with your Aunt Donna and some friends, you be good and take care of Sarah.” “Okay, Mom, bye.”

Cathy grabs a towel out of the closet and then reaches up high to get her swimming cap, she rarely used it but you never know, she had to get on her tippy-toes to reach which nearly crushed poor Scott. “Okay bye? Shannon, come’ on, Sweetie.” Cathy walks out of the house and down the street with Shannon right behind.

1111211.content:
Cathy walks out of the house with Shannon in her arms, humming casually, she begins to stroll down the sidewalk on the way to the community pool. As she makes her way she smiles at the neighbors and they smile back, completely unaware of the terror that goes on below, inside something as innocent as a shoe.

You try to scream as you're thrown up and down, but all that does is allow the cotton from Cathy's sock to be forced down into your mouth. Tears stream down your cheeks are you thrash about, desperately trying to get your mothers attention. With each step, you are smothered with the stifling sock and you fear for your life. Up and down. Up and down. Each footstep feels like an earthquake and the heat is making you dizzy.

Cathy arrives at the pool gates where Donna and some other friends are waiting. Cathy begins to talk to them about current events and such. As they stand and gossip Cathy lifts the foot that holds you prisoner and slams it down before engaging in shoe play.

Meanwhile, you feel the walking stop and take the time to start thrashing again. Nothing. Or at least, nothing you want to happen. The shoe prison lifts up and then slams down with deafening force, knocking the air from your body, then her gigantic foot begins to exit the shoe slightly, allowing some air and light in. You desperately try to gulp in air, and that's when the smell hits you. Your mother's foot is starting to smell a bit, but to you the sharp foot odor hits you like a ton of bricks. The foot slides slightly from the shoe but then plows back in, burying you under tons of flesh and cotton and then suddenly more walking.

Cathy and her friends sit down as they prepare the kids to have some fun in the pool. As Cathy sits and talks she feels a little disturbance in her shoe...

Cathy is sitting at a small table in the shade with her best friend Karen, older sister Donna, her coworker Halley Jones, and Jessie Belies who was a friend of Donna’s daughter Rachel and sometimes babysat Shannon and Sarah for Cathy when she had to work late or Scott and Kelly were busy with other teenager things.

Cathy and Donna watched their children play in the pool and talked about a variety of things, including Karen’s new found enjoyment of dance clubs, and Donna’s new social life since she got her hair died almost a red as Karen’s and her breasts enlarged. Cathy joked that if Donna wasn’t careful she might turn out like their younger sister Megan. Both women laughed. Jessie talked about her new boy friend and all the older women thought back to when they were young and dating, oh if only to dream.

While all this chit chat is going on up above, down below Scott is not have any fun at all. The giant foot had shifted and now ever few seconds the big toe would slam down on him and grind him into the sole. He couldn’t breath and when he tried to block it with his arms they were smashed down and nearly shattered by the shear force of the massive wall of cotton and flesh. What did his mom think he was some pebble or something in her shoe? He was bruised and battered and his mind was trying to get his body to get out of the way but there just wasn’t any time. WAMB…WAMB…WAMB again and again.

Cathy felt the small tear in her insole and tried repeatedly to place it back into place with her big toe but for some odd reason it just wouldn’t fit back in. As she and Karen talked about how they should go out on a girls night out perhaps pick up some studs at a bar, just joking of course she started pivoting her entire foot onto the front of the sole and try to smash the torn material back into place. She never in a million years would have guessed she was trying to grind her beloved eldest child into the sole of her foot.

111121122.content:
The hot, stuffy world of inside Cathy's shoe is getting worse by the second which each step she takes. Your mother enters the locker room, her titanic sock-clad foot smashing into you over and over. All you can make out through the walls of the mule is gossip between the two women and it's driving you mad.

Suddenly, as if Cathy could hear your anger and is punishing you, your prison tightens up even more as her toes scrunch you up. You scream out, thinking you're about to be crushed, but that causes the cotton from the sock to be forced into your open mouth. Cathy's toes settle once again around you, leaving you to gag on the giant strand of fabric.

The gossip continues and then suddenly the prison begins to shake violently, and light filters in! Your mother is finally taking her shoe off. You are dragged along on the bottom of the leather and then begin to lift up with her foot. Scared of falling, you grasp onto the bottom of her sock and look around as you rise up, seeing the locker room and your mother's friend Karen. You try to scream and shot out for help, but you lose your hold and begin plummeting from the giant foot to the floor below.

You cringe, expecting to be splattered on tile floor but instead hit a firm yet yielding navy blue surface. The ground beneath you is particularly darkened with bits of dirt (the size of pebbles to you) here and there. As you struggle to get to your feet you look to the right of you and notice the same sort of surface, with a massive strap rising from...

a flip flop! You've landed on your mother's flip flop! It takes some time to register, but you remember seeing these before. The faint odor of Cathy's feet hang over these shoes. You stand up, seeing Karen's gigantic feet in the distance, sliding out of their flats and onto the tile floor with a heavy thud that knocks you on your butt. You notice Karen's feet are well kept, with painted toenails.

Looking up, you see your mom's face staring down at you and you begin jumping up and down and shouting.

"Mom! Mom! I'm down here! Help!!"

"MY YOU ARE TREATING YOURSELF! PLANNING ON ATTRACTING SOME YOUNG THING?"

Cathy's voice booms down like thunder and you realize that she's not looking at you at all, she's admiring her friend's pedicure. After Karen's reply you see your mom's shirt and bra fall down to the ground with a loud whump. You look up but immediately regret; you don't want to see her topless!

You get up and get ready to find a place to hide when a shadow falls over you. You were so distracted that you forgot you were on a shoe. Cathy's bare foot slides onto the massive sandal and you get slammed between her big and second toes, crushed into the separator that the strap is attached to.

The two women continue their conversation, oblivious to the human suffering beneath them as they head out to the pool. Suddenly Karen booms up from above "I FORGOT MY TOWEL" and goes back. Cathy however keeps going and before you know it you're at the edge of the pool.

Between the strap separator and her big toe, you wince and struggle to move or do anything to get out of this predicament. But your mom seems to dictate your fate at this point and as she kicks off her flip flops you remain stuck to the side of her toe. You look down in horror as the water approaches you swiftly and then suddenly you are plunged under.

Cathy simply dipped her foot in the water to see how cold it was, but to you it was like you were submerged in the ocean. The giant foot is pulled out from the depths, and you were lucky you weren't washed away. The chlorine assaults your senses and you begin screaming again to your mom, desperate to get her attention. Cathy simply lifts her foot over the pool, getting ready to get in...

You snap awake and in incredible pain. Your back hurts like hell. Slowly you open your eyes and your hands reach for the back of your head and lower back. Hey, wait my hands are free, I’m out, you realize. For a blessed moment since you have been in this hell you are free. Then you notice you are in some shady place with a rubber floor and you look straight ahead and see two giant bare feet crossed no more than twenty feet from you. Rolling over you slowly get up. There is a loud noise coming from beneath you and you hear the indistinguishable sounds above mix with the noise below. You have no idea what is going on.

The floor is vibrating and you have trouble keeping your balance. Slowly you look around and see two giant platforms that you became way to familiar with already. Wanting to get away from them you risk venturing closer to the giant feet that you assume is your mom but you can’t see very far up the giant ankle and leg. You manage to walk unsteadily despite the floor moving and your back around the feet and see that you are in some kind of hole or…a car seat, the room between the dashboard and feet room. Okay, I figured this out. That wall to your right though you can’t see over it is where the driver probably has the arm rest.

Then an idea comes to you. The rubber is just a mat over the fuzzy upholstery of the base of the car’s interior. If I can climb up, you think, to the arm rest I can be seen and no way can I be stepped on or trapped. OW, a stabbing of pain get into your back side. You go to your knees and take a breather. Too fast, I’m moving to fast, you say to yourself. How long has it been since you heard the sound of your own voice besides screaming?

After a short break you feel the vibrations from the floor getting slower. Maybe Mom is ready to get out soon, I got to getup there, you think to yourself with determination. You force yourself to work through the pain and start taking hold of the fuzzy and stringy material and start climbing up trying to get to the seats above and the arm rest. Whose car is this if mom isn’t driving?

You are so close to the top and your arms are dead tired and your back is screaming for mercy. So close you tell yourself, keep going. You ignore the fact that you are only a few feet from your mom’s giant thighs right behind you. You keep going up then STOP, the car comes to a halt and you go flying in the recoil…

After blushing and appreciating the intimate situation of being between a woman's legs you turn your focus and pent up excitement toward climbing the dress. It took a good seventeen minutes before reaching the side of her bosom as Alex savored and bit into her morsels leaving you with crumbs descending like rain.

"Just a little more, I just need to get to her ear" as you continue your ascent you noticed a...well a strong scent. The scent of body odor to be precise. It seems the woman's deodorant was running wearing off, or just as likely the smell is intensified because you were so close to her armpit. Doing your best to press past the smell you climb the dress shoulder strap leaving you sprawled on Alex's shoulder. Your arms and legs were burning and you were almost out of breath, and the unholy concoction of BO and deodorant wasn't helping. Alex meanwhile was still oblivious to your struggles as was the whole boozy horde of women present. You get onto your feet but struggle to keep your footing as Alex continues to move about and occasionally wipe away crumbs from the edge of her lips. In desperation you yell hoping that by some miracle she could hear your miniature voice though the energetic howls of these titans. Of course she didn't notice as she begins to hunch over to wipe a smudge off her glasses using her dress.

This sudden degree change has caused you to loose your footing and fall off the giantesses shoulder and land in
15113123.title: Upward and onward

choices: Aunt Tara and Kelly coming down
Cathy comes down
Someone else is coming down the stairs
152.content:
You catch your breath. Okay, I’m really small… you think to yourself and look around…really, really small. There has to be something to do and that is the age old thing of running to Mom. Your basic instincts are kicking in, always run to your Mommy. You get up and head for the stairs which isn’t easy with the thick carpet. You stay close to the baseboard again instinct told you that having a wall against your back made you safer, danger can only come from one direction now.

You make it to the edge of the first step down, wow it is a long drop. It looks to be about fifteen or sixteen feet high. You think you can walk along the baseboard which slightly protrudes outward and slants down. You reach up and jump trying to pull yourself up but it is no use it is at least 2 feet out of your reach. You sit down on the edge and it dawns on you, not for the first time, that it really isn’t feet you’re measuring they are inches and centimeters. You feel how soft the carpet his under you. Maybe you can jump. Fifteen or sixteen feet can’t kill you if your landing on something soft and don’t land on your back even the fall from your mom’s laundry basket didn’t kill you and that was much higher. You look around and walking along the edge you notice that the carpet is thickest in the center, makes sense because people walk on the sides or straddle the middle when walking up a stair case. Slowly you slide over the edge and when you were far enough you let go and drop…PLUNK, you land on the soft carpet feet first and then finishing in a crouch on all fours. Good, that didn’t heart too much.

Moving to the next one you repeat the motion with the same result, okay only 13 more to go. You make it down another four in the space of what must be fifteen or twenty minutes. It is tiring dropping down and moving to the next one. You flex your hands and stretch your shoulders, been a while since you had to do PE, too bad. You are about to go onto your seventh step when you feel vibrations und your foot. You are in the middle of letting yourself down. You are frozen sprawled over the edge. You can’t tell where it is coming from, up or coming down…the vibrations are getting quicker...

****Hello all! I'm still making sure this story continues to go! I've been away for a bit but I have some ideas for new chapters. Also do not get discouraged if I have deleted a chapter of yours. It could have been it just didn't fit where I wanted it. I'd just like to ask again, no one lined chapters please. Keep on writing!****

You - Scott, 18 years old.

He lives with mom and 3 sisters, his dad left them after Sarah was born.......

Cathy (Your mother) - 37 years old. She has always been a good mother, always caring about her kids. That is when they are normal size at least. She tries to keep in shape, but like most mothers, she can't keep looking like she is 20. Thick women with brown hair.

Kelly - 16 years old. You and kelly have always been close, but you have always had your arguments. She has always been told she is a younger version of her mother. She has brown hair with blond highlights. She is a skinny girl, with a great figure.

Shannon - 7 years old. She has always been the more tomboy sister. She enjoys playing with bugs, and running around. She always seemed a bit weird with how she treated bugs, but hey she is only 7.

Sarah - 3 years old. What can you say about her. Shes only 3 years old.

Todd (Your father) - 39 years old. He is now dating another women. You don't see him much anymore.

Tina - 32 years old. She is your dad's girlfriend. She seemed oddly fond of you though.

Kim (Your Girlfriend) - 19 years old. She is a great looking girl. Blond hair with blue eyes, not fat at all, just a great curvy figure. Not to mention very nice breasts.


Only a few rules really, and there just so everyone can enjoy this story and so it doesn't die along with alot of stuff on here. First thing is this is an Unaware Story, so I'd like to keep it so its unaware, now with that in mind, I don't mind if he is seen or caught for a little, as long as he is then made unaware again. For example, a child can find him but then lose him. No one planned this to happen, it was not a potion, or a bracelet, or whatever else. Along with that, no one can change his size, he can't grow or shrink more. Scott himself is not gay, but he can run into gay characters and be forced into situations, but its not his choice. Since this is my story I don't care about age, I don't care if you add characters, and whatever you want to do with animals is fine with me.....
